mapper.select: SELECT SEAT_NO, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM RESERVATION_PLACE RP WHERE RP.SEAT_NO = SEATS.SEAT_NO AND RP.RESERVATION_DT = TO_DATE(#{reservationDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND RP.START_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AND RP.START_TIME < TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') ) THEN '사용중' ELSE '공석' END AS SEAT_STATUS FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS SEAT_NO FROM ( SELECT 1 FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 24 ) ) SEATS
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION_PLACE VALUES ( SEQ_RESERVATION_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{seatNo}, TO_DATE(#{reservationDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') )
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(START_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS START_TIME, TO_CHAR(END_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AS END_TIME FROM RESERVATION_PLACE WHERE RESERVATION_DT = #{date}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION_PLACE VALUES ( SEQ_RESERVATION_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, 0, TO_DATE(#{reservationDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') )
